outline.ch:
"‧ Introduction
‧Groundwater Definitions, Equations and Flow Net Method
‧Groundwater Flow within Soil Stratifications
‧Discussion of Hydraulic Conductivity, Measurement Approaches and Scale Effects
‧Methods of Fragments and Method of Conformal Mapping
‧Dupuit‘s Theory - Small Gradient Case
‧Transient Flows – Theis‘ Theory and Consolidation Flow
‧Partly Saturated Flows
‧Numerical Methods
‧Applications in Civil Engineering Projects"
outline.en:
"‧ Introduction
‧Groundwater Definitions, Equations and Flow Net Method
‧Groundwater Flow within Soil Stratifications
‧Discussion of Hydraulic Conductivity, Measurement Approaches and Scale Effects
‧Methods of Fragments and Method of Conformal Mapping
‧Dupuit‘s Theory - Small Gradient Case
‧Transient Flows – Theis‘ Theory and Consolidation Flow
‧Partly Saturated Flows
‧Numerical Methods
‧Applications in Civil Engineering Projects"

textbook.ch:
"Cedergren, H.R., Seepage, Drainage and Flow Nets, 3rd edition, Wiley, 1989
Bear, J., Dynamics of Fluids in Porous Media, Dover Publications, Inc., New York, 1988
Bear, J.  and Verruijt, A., Modeling Groundwater Flow and Pollution, D. Reidel Publishing Company, Dordrecht, The Netherland, 1987
Harr, M.E., Groundwater and Seepage, McGraw-Hill, New York, 1962
Reddi, L.N., Seepage in Soils. Principles and Applications, John Wiley & Sons, N.J., 2003
Holtz, R.D. and Kovas, W.D., An Introduction to Geotechnical Engineering, Prentice-Hall, Inc., Englewood Cliffs, N.J., 1981
Lambe, T.W. and Whitman, R.V., Soil Mechanics, John Wiley and Sons, New York, 1979
Mitchell, J.K., Fundamentals of Soil Behavior, 2nd Edition, John Wiley and Sons, Inc., New York, 1993"
textbook.en:
"Cedergren, H.R., Seepage, Drainage and Flow Nets, 3rd edition, Wiley, 1989

gradMethod.ch:
‧ Homework (20%)
‧ Midterm Exam (30%) and Term Project – Oral Presentation and Report (40%)
‧ Classroom participation (10%)
gradMethod.en:
‧ Homework (20%)
‧ Midterm Exam (30%) and Term Project – Oral Presentation and Report (40%)
‧ Classroom participation (10%)

ch.competencies: 策劃及執行專題研究之能力
研發創新及獨立解決問題之能力
跨領域協調整合之能力
國際觀及永續發展理念
領導、管理及規劃之能力
終身自我學習成長之能力

en.competencies: The Ability of Planning and Implementing Research Projects
The Ability in Writing Technical Papers
The Ability in Research, Innovation, and Problem Solving
The Ability of Interdisciplinary Integration and Coordination
International Perspective and Concept of Sustainable Development

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系。年級:限四年級。
en: Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:Fourth Year only.
